explains: n. 陵墓；阴森森的大厦

sentences.en: Guards of Lenin's mausoleum were in felt boots with galoshes.
sentences.cn: 列宁陵墓的守卫们穿着毡靴的胶套鞋。

sentences.en: Guards of Lenin's mausoleum in felt boots with galoshes.
sentences.cn: 列宁陵墓的守卫们，穿着毡靴的胶套鞋。

sentences.en: A cemetery in Spain has placed solar panels atop its mausoleum.
sentences.cn: 西班牙建成太阳能墓地。
